formData.source:
global diff_count
diff = get_from_session("diff").iloc[::,1::] # skip tckn due to gdpr
main_report = diff.to_html(index=False).replace('<table border="1"','<table style="width:100%;"')\
.replace('<thead','<thead style="background:#0b5579;color:white;"')\
.replace('style="text-align: right;"','')\
.replace("<td",'<td style="border-bottom: 0px solid white;"')\
.replace('<tbody','<tbody style="background:#b2b2b7;"')\
.replace('None', '-')

diff_count = len(diff)

formData.source:
from datetime import datetime
staff_table = get_from_session("staff")

staff_email = staff_table["ePosta"]
leave_date = staff_table["sonTarih"]
leave_begin = staff_table["ilkTarih"]
leave_duration = (datetime.strptime(leave_date, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") - datetime.strptime(leave_begin, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")).days + 1

formData.source:
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
soup = BeautifulSoup(html_text, "html.parser")

table_data = []

table = soup.find('table')
rows = table.find_all('tr')

for row in rows:
 cells = row.find_all(['th','td'])
 cell_data = []
 for cell in cells:
 cell_data.append(cell.get_text(strip=True))
 table_data.append(cell_data)

sgk_list.extend(table_data[1::])

Merhaba,

Aşağıda sicil numarası, adı ve soyadı belirtilen personelinizin 4C SGK sistemine raporu işlenmemiştir.
